summary:
Nyan Heroes Partners with Premier Organization G2 Esports to Establish Esports Presence - Nyan Heroes, a Web3 Hero Shooter, partners with G2 Esports to establish esports presence.

 9 Lives Interactive Secures $3 Million to Support Global Launch of Nyan Heroes, a Web3 Hero Shooter - 9 Lives Interactive secures $3 million to support the global launch of Nyan Heroes, a Web3 Hero Shooter game.
